data.title: University of the East
data.text:
University of the East, City of Manila Pro Deo et Patria

Universidad ning Aslagan, Lakanbalen ning Menila Motto “In the Service of the Youth, Country and God,” Susuyu king Kayanakan, king Bangsa ampo king Ginu Mitátag 1946 Uri Privadu, alang secta Talapamuntuk (Chairman) Lucio C. Tan, Panfilo O. Domingo Canciller Celso D. Benologa Pamuntuk Ester A. Garcia Magaral king kolehiyo maigit 20,000 Magaral a postgraduate maigit 1,500 Lugal Menila, Keragulang Manila,

Campus Urban, 38,000 m² Imno Pamantasan Naming Mahal (UE Hymn) Kule Malutu ampong Maputi Palayo UE Red Warriors Mascot Red Warrior Kaugne ASAIHL, IAU, UAAP Website/Karinan-Aptas www.ue.edu.ph

Ing University of the East (UE) metung yang universidad a privadu ampong alang sectang atiu king karinan a University Belt, king distrito ning Sampaloc, Menila, Filipinas. Mitátag ya ing universidad kanitang 1946 antimong institusion a maki lálaki ampong bábai. Ing UE ing mumunang universidad king Asiang maki mágaral a maigit king 60,000 (anam a pulung libu), at meaus yang Largest University in Asia (Pekamaragul a Universidad king Asia) basi king populasiun kanita.[citation needed]

King maigit nang 60 (anam a pulung banua) ning pamagsilbi, meragul ya at meging metung a privadung universidad a gagalangan da king Filipinas.[1] King salukuyan, miyayampang yang cursu king comerciu (commerce) ampong pamanibala king negociu (business administration), leyi (law), dentistry, engineering, alit ampong siensia (arts and sciences), fine arts, pamanuru (education), computer technology, nursing, physical therapy, medisina (medicine) ampong pamagaral a graduadu (graduate studies). Atin yang aduang extension campus ing University of the East: ing UE Caloocan ampo ing UERM king Quezon Lakanbalen.

Metung ya ing UE kareng walung universidad a kayanib king University Athletic Association of the Philippines (UAAP), nung nu ya kayanib manibat aniang 1952. Ing UE ing meging makiabala (‘’host’’) ketang UAAP Season 69.

Pigkalubanan da lang Level II status ning Philippine Association of Colleges and Universities Commission on Accreditation (PACUCOA) deng mapilang colegiu ning UE - Manila. Kinilala ne ning Commission on Higher Education (CHED) ing Information Technology Department antimong Center of Development in Information Technology Education. [2] Den namang colegiu ning UERMMMC, dininan nong matas a level ning Philippine Accrediting Agency of Schools, Colleges and Universities (PAASCU). Atin yang level II accreditation ing College of Medicine has level II accreditation ampong Innovative Curriculum, at mekilala yang Center of Excellence in Research (Sentru ning Kabiasnan king Pamanialiksik) ning Department of Science and Technology. Ita namang College of Nursing, atin yang level III accreditation king Commission on Higher Education as Centers of Excellence.

Miraras king Setiembre 1946 ing amlat ning University of the East, king metung a kuartung upahan king Dasmariñas St., Menila, nung nu la makalista kareng ) review class para king Certified Public Accountant (CPA) deng 110 a magaral. Kapakayan ning grupu da reng talaturu king comerciu, a panimunan nang Dr. Francisco T. Dalupan, Sr., Ing manimuna kareng talaturu king comerciu, ing pamaniaup king bangsa, a e pa mibangun king gera. Karetang 110 a estudianting deta, apat la reng kayabe karetang matas dili king 1947 CPA board Examinations. [3]

Aniang Setiembri 11, 1946, tetag de reng limang tau, di Francisco Dalupan, Sr., Herminiglio Reyes, Jose Torres, Jaime Hernandez ampo i Santiago dela Cruz, ing Philippine College of Commerce and Business Administration (PCCBA) king R. Papa St. king w:Sampaloc, Manila. Tinanggap yang 350 estudianti aniang kaleldo (summer) ning 1947. Aniang tutuking banua, mas dakal lang mágaral deng migpalista, miragdagan la reng academic unit, at minalis ya ing PCCBA ketang salukuyan nang sentrung campus ning UE king 2219 Claro M. Recto Avenue.

Matagumpe la kareng iksamin na king accountancy ning kapamahalan deng miyari king PCCBA. Uli na niti, dininan neng paintulut ing PCCBA a mitátag aliwa pang colegiu, at mitikdo la reng Colegiu ning Liberal Arts, Business Administration, ampong Dentistry, ampo ing Esculang Pang-graduadu ning Pamanibalang Negosiu (the Graduate School of Business Administration). [4]

Pigkalubanan deng kabilian a universidad ing PCCBA kanitang Julio 3, 1951, at miyalilan ya lagiu king University of the East. I Dalupan ing meging mumunang Pamuntuk (President) ning UE ampong Talapamuntuk (Chairman) ning Lupung da reng Manibala (Board of Trustees). Deng mumunang galamé ning Lupung ila pin di Herminigildo B. Reyes, metung a negosianti, scholar, ampong sadiang Kaduang Pamuntuk (Vice President) ning Universidad ning Pilipinas; i Santiago F. de la Cruz, metung a CPA ampong business executive a minalili kang Dalupan antimong Pamuntuk ning UE; i Jose L. Torres, metung a sundalus, negosianti, ampong accountant; ampo i Jaime Hernandez, a sadiang Kalihim ning Pisalapian (Secretary of Finance).

Aniang Junio 1954, memusni yang bayung campus ing UE a ausan dang UE Tech king metung a loting maki 4.86 ektarea king Dalang Samson (Samson Road), king Caloocan. Ing UE Caloocan, magsarili ne ngeni (autonomous) kareng pisasabian a academicu, at panibalan ne ning metung a Canciller (Chancellor). Makabili la reng Colleges of Arts and Sciences, Business Administration, ampong Fine Arts king bayung Tan Yan Kee Academic Building, kabang atin yang sarili nang gusali ing College of Engineering. Manibat kanitang 1986, gagamitan de ing UE Caloocan king ROTC ampong CAT.

Sinali yang metung a ektareang loti king Aurora Boulevard king Quezon Lakanbalen ing UE kanitang 1955, at keti ne tinikdo ing Colegiu ning Medicina (College of Medicine). Aniang Mayo 17,1957, megi yang foundation ing Colegiu, at mipalaguan yang UE Ramon Magsaysay Memorial Medical Center (UERMMMC).

Aniang 1962, mika loti yang 5,850-metru cuadradu ing Universidad king arap ning UERMMMC. Ini ing meging the Research Center for Sciences, Humanities and Culture (Sentru para king Pamanialiksik king Siensia, Humanidades ampong Cultura), a maki aduang gusali. Ketang mumuna, makabili ya ing School of Music and Arts (Escuela ning Musica ampong Alit), at ita namang metung ing lugal ning College of Dentistry ampo reng laboratoriu ning pamanialiksik (research laboratories). Minalis ya king Caloocan campus ing School of Music and Arts, a ngeni College of Fine Arts (Colegiu ning Malagung Alit), kanitang 1981. Aniang libutad ning decadang 1960, kinua neng Dr. Francisco Dalupan i Dr. Francisco Dalupan ba neng lalangan ng sagisag ning balang taga-UE ing Lualhati, ibat king modelung i Ophelia Salas, metung a mágaral ning CBA. Minalis ya ing College of Dentistry king Recto (Manila) campus aniang banuang academicung (school year) 1988-1989.

Aniang 1967, ing meangu bie Pamuntuk Diosdado Macapagal, ing tata nang Pamuntuk Gloria Macapagal-Arroyo, tinuru yang part-time king College of Business Administration, at inaus neng "People's University" ing UE. [citation needed]

Kayagnan ning pamagparagul king universidad ing pamandagdag king bilang da reng magaral. Manibat kareng 110 a estudianti kanitang 1946, miragdagan ing populasiun da reng mágaral, at miras king 60,000 iti aniang 1960, nung kapilan ing UE ing meging mumunang universidad a maki magaral a maigit king anam a pulung libu. Disan na ing pekamatas a bilang da reng mágaral aniang mumunang semestri ning 1975-1976, nung kapilan 67,443 la reng makalista. Ngeni, atin nong 250,000 deng miyari king UE.

E milisia ing UE ketang crisis king kabiayan ampong recession a tinud king Filipinas aniang decadang 1980. Miyapektuan ya iti king pangabagsak ning pesus, taglus-taglus a inflation, matas a sueldu, ampong pamagwelga da reng talaturu, empleadu ampong estudianti. Mebawas la reng magaral, mebayat ing crisis, at digsu ne mu mipisali ing escuela king metung a grupung relihiosung ibat aliwang labuad.

Migkasákit ya uli ning prublema king kualta ampong king pamanuru aniang mabilug a decadang 1980. Aniang megi yang pamuntuk i Dr. Isidro D. Cariño aniang 1984, peparapat yang miayaliwang patakaran, kayabe na ing pamagbawas kareng empleadu, pamagpababa king gastus, ampong pamagpaupa kareng pasilidad na ampong lugal ning universidad king makuyad (short-term leases) ampong makabang (long-term leases) a panaun. Miyampang yang ladderized curriculum ing UE, espesial a cursu kareng executive, program ibat king the Institute for Computer Studies and Systems, ampong scholarship para kareng mágaral accounting ampong engineering. Uli ning pamagpaupa, e melaus ing pamagtas king matrikula (tuition fees) aniang 1986-1987 ampong 1987-1988.

Aniang mituldu yang Kalihim ning Pamanuru (Secretary of Education) ning Filipinas kanitang 1990 i Cariño, minalili ya anting Talapamuntuk ning Lupung da reng Mangasiwa (Chairman of the Board of Trustees) i Panfilo O. Domingo, former President of Philippine National Bank, Pun Talapaganap (Chief Executive Officer) ampong Pansamantalang Pamuntuk (Acting President) ning Universidad.

Kabud milukluk ya, penigobran nang Domingo ing pamaglutas king problema na king pisalapian ning Universidad kapamilatan ning pamag-retiru kareng utang nang pang-makuyad a panaun short-term ampo ing pamipaliari kareng kapanumanan o reporma king pamangastus ampong pamagpalakad. Kilub ning limang banua, maragul ing mebawas kareng utang ning universidad, at milako ya kareng libru ing maluat nang mititipun a utang king pamagpalakad (operational debt). Kayagnan na niti, inumpisan nang Domingo ing metung a pangkabilugan a pamaniamasan kareng gusali ampong pasilidad, at saka king pamanuru, ning universidad.

Kanitang 1992, ing sadiang Talaingat Bandi (Treasurer) ning Filipinas, i Rosalina S. Cajucom, ing meging Pamuntuk ning UE. Aniang migretiru ya kanitang libutad ning 1995, i Domingo ing linukluk pasibayu king panga-pamuntuk angga king pamanuldu kang Dr. Josefina R. Cortes aniang 1997. Inalilan na ne mang G. Baltazar N. Endriga aniang migretiru ya kanitang 2003.

http://www.mb.com.ph/issues/2004/07/30/SCAU2004073015212.html%7Caccessdate = 2006-09-20}}</ref> Megi lang matagumpe deng programa ning UE manibat aniang migumpisa ya angga king dekadang 1980, nung kapilan deng ibat king escuela deng pekamatas (topnotcher) king CPA board exams. Den muring miyari king universidad deng pekamatas kareng iksamin king Dentistry, Engineering, Education, Medicine, Nursing ampong Physical Therapy.[5]

Angga ngeni, dininan neng kabilian a deregulated ning Commission on Higher Education ing UE Manila, kabang mirinan lang Level II accreditation ning Philippine Association of Colleges and Universities Commission on Accreditation (PACUCOA) deng keraklan kareng kayang colegiu. Deng namang colegiu ning UERMMMC, kinilala no ning PhilippineAccrediting Agency of Schools, Colleges and Universities (PAASCU). Maki level II accreditation ya ing College of Medicine, at level III ne man ing College of Nursing.

Bayu-bayu pamu, meaus yang "One of the Most Wired Universities in the Country" ing Universidad ,[6] agpang king Computer World Magazine ampo ing Enterprise Magazine. Miyabe na naman king 2006 Computerworld Premier 100 of Computer World Magazine ing universidad antimong metung kareng labing lima (15) kareng mumunang dinalan (top 100) a corporasiun ampong cumpania king pamangamit king w:Information technology, nung nu ya kabud pipagaralan a miyabe king tala/listaan.

Minalis ya ing universidad manibat king ATM paras king Gigabit Ethernet ba nang asupportan ing daragul a pamangailangan king Aptas (online requirements), miraragdagan a kagiwan king pamagaral king Aptas, (expanding online learning capabilities), ampong sasanting a pamagpalakad ketang kayang campus king Menila kapamilatan ning metung a Ethernet networking solution ibat king Nortel Networks.[7] Uli ning pamagpasikan kagiwan (upgrade), lalung salese ing bilis na ampong pamanupad (performance) ning pamangamit da reng talaturu ampong mágaral kareng kasangkapan king pamagaral king Aptas (online learning resources) ampong online records. Suportan na mu naman niting upgrade ing balak ning universidad a ituglung ya ing pasilidad na king Menila karetang king Caloocan ampong Quezon Lakanbalen.

King salukuyan, tinuldu neng Center of Development in Information Technology Education (Sentru ning Pamanalksu king Tecnolohiang Pang-impormasiun) ing University of the East. [8] Kinilala neng Center of Development (COD) in Information Technology Education ing Information Technology Department manibat Marzo 1, 2007 anggang Diciembre 31, 2010.

University of the East Caloocan - Atiu king Caloocan City, king Samson Road. Metung yang magsariling (autonomous) a panibalan ning metung a Canciller (Chancellor) a bibilugan da reng College of Business Administration , Arts and Sciences, Engineering, ampong Fine Arts. Ing UE Caloocan ausan deng Caloocan Campus ba yang pialiwa king Manila Campus king C.M. Recto Avenue.

University of the East Ramon Magsaysay Memorial Medical Center (UERMMMC) - Located in Quezon City, along Aurora Boulevard. Ing UERMMMC metung yang pundasiun a alang stock ampong alang tubu, at pekilagiu re kang Pamuntuk Ramon Magsaysay manibat aniang 1957. Atin yang apat a departamentu ing UERM: College of Medicine, Nursing, Physical Therapy ampong Graduate School.

Menibat ya king pamisanib ning Graduate School of Business (a mitátag aniang 1948) ampo ing Graduate School of Education (a mitátag aniang 1963) kanitang 1982

Aniang Enero 27, 1957, kinua neng Dr. Francisco T. Dalupan i National Artist Guillermo Tolentino bang maglalang king monumentung Lualhati, metung a sagisag ning balang mágaral king UE. Ing migsilbing modelu para king Lualhati ya pin i Ophelia Salas, metung a magaral king CBA. Mayayakit ya ing monumentu king Santiago dela Cruz Building quadrangle.

Ing UE Manila campus, a ausan da muring UE Main Campus, bibilugan de reng labing aduang gusaling atiu king busal ning karinan a University Belt, Sampaloc, Menila. Makayarap ya iti king Claro M. Recto Avenue, ing malapit a Mendiola Street ampo ing w:Legarda LRT Station.

Romulo (Honoris Causa, Doctor of Laws 1969) Sugu (diplomat) ning Filipinas, politicu, periodista ampong talasulat. (AB Journalism) [10] Virgilio "Rio" S. Mibansagan yang "The Dean" uli ning megaral (scholarly) nang pamagdiscursu king pialung. Lima nong NBA Finals deng belita nang Joaquin Henson manibat ketang karinan para king telebisiung Filipinu. Mekatanggap neng pilang galal (awards) i Henson, kayabe ne ing mumunang Olympism Award ibat king Philippine Olympic Committee para king kabiasnan king periodismu.
